observations: Colors spread to fill adjacent areas of the same color.
The outer border color does not change.
Adjacent areas of the same color merge.
hypotheses: Expand each color region until it meets another color region, but do not overwrite the border.
For each non-zero value in the input, expand that region to fill horizontally and vertically until it hits a different value or the grid boundaries, excluding the external border.
Iteratively expand each color by one layer outwards, stopping when a different color is encountered or when the border is reached.

rejected_hypotheses.hypothesis: Iteratively expand each color by one layer outwards without border restrictions.
rejected_hypotheses.reason: This overwrites the border values in the training examples.

selected_rule: Expand each color region until it meets another color region, but do not overwrite the border.
step_plan: Identify contiguous regions of the same color.
Expand each region by one layer, until it encounters a region of a different color or the grid border.
Do not modify the pixels on the border of the grid.
